languages.text: {n}Хейнрикс едва слышно смеется.{/n} "Нет. Я защищаю тебя. Варп-лед... физическое проявление колдовства. Я пытаюсь сдержать прорыв. И чем больше я это делаю, тем сильнее становится лед. Хорошо. Правильно. Я стану глыбой, если это позволит уберечь тебя".

traits.locale_text: {n}Хейнрикс едва слышно смеется.{/n} "Нет. Я защищаю тебя. Варп-лед... физическое проявление колдовства. Я пытаюсь сдержать прорыв. И чем больше я это делаю, тем сильнее становится лед. Хорошо. Правильно. Я стану глыбой, если это позволит уберечь тебя".

languages.text: {n}Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "No. I'm protecting you. The warp-ice... is a physical manifestation of my sorcery. I am trying to hold back the breach. And the more I try, the stronger the ice becomes. That's good. It should. I'll become a block of ice if it lets me keep you safe."
languages.original_text: {n}Хейнрикс едва слышно смеется.{/n} "Нет. Я защищаю тебя. Варп-лед... физическое проявление колдовства. Я пытаюсь сдержать прорыв. И чем больше я это делаю, тем сильнее становится лед. Хорошо. Правильно. Я стану глыбой, если это позволит уберечь тебя".

And the more I try, the stronger the ice becomes. That's good. It should. I'll become a block of ice if it lets me keep you safe."

{n}Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "No. I'm protecting you. The warp-ice... is a physical manifestation of my sorcery. I am trying to hold back the breach. And the more I try, the stronger the ice becomes. That's good. It should. I'll become a block of ice if it lets me keep you safe."

{n}Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "No. I'm protecting you. The warp-ice... is a physical manifestation of my sorcery. I am trying to hold back the breach. And the more I try, the stronger the ice becomes. That's good. It should. I'll become a block of ice if it lets me keep you safe."

{n}Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "No. I'm protecting you. The warp-ice... is a physical manifestation of my sorcery. I am trying to hold back the breach. And the more I try, the stronger the ice becomes. That's good. It should. I'll become a block of ice if it lets me keep you safe."

languages.text: {n}海因里希气喘吁吁地笑了起来。{/n}“不，我是在保护你。这些来自亚空间的寒冰……就是我巫术力量的具体表现。我正在努力制止裂隙蔓延。我越是努力，身上的冰就越是厚重。这很好，也应该这样。只要能保障你的安全，我就算是变成冰块，也心甘情愿。”
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "No. I'm protecting you. The warp-ice... is a physical manifestation of my sorcery. I am trying to hold back the breach. And the more I try, the stronger the ice becomes. That's good. It should. I'll become a block of ice if it lets me keep you safe."

traits.locale_text: {n}海因里希气喘吁吁地笑了起来。{/n}“不，我是在保护你。这些来自亚空间的寒冰……就是我巫术力量的具体表现。我正在努力制止裂隙蔓延。我越是努力，身上的冰就越是厚重。这很好，也应该这样。只要能保障你的安全，我就算是变成冰块，也心甘情愿。”

languages.text: {n}Heinrix se ríe por lo bajo.{/n} «No. Le estoy protegiendo. El hielo de disformidad... es una manifestación física de mi hechicería. Estoy conteniendo la brecha, pero cuanto más me esfuerzo más rígido se vuelve el hielo. Y me alegro. Mejor así. Si eso me permite protegerla, me convertiré en un témpano con mucho gusto».
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "No. I'm protecting you. The warp-ice... is a physical manifestation of my sorcery. I am trying to hold back the breach. And the more I try, the stronger the ice becomes. That's good. It should. I'll become a block of ice if it lets me keep you safe."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix se ríe por lo bajo.{/n} «No. Le estoy protegiendo. El hielo de disformidad... es una manifestación física de mi hechicería. Estoy conteniendo la brecha, pero cuanto más me esfuerzo más rígido se vuelve el hielo. Y me alegro. Mejor así. Si eso me permite protegerla, me convertiré en un témpano con mucho gusto».

languages.text: {n}ハインリックスは息を殺して笑う。{/n}「違う。俺があなたを守っているんだ。ワープ・アイスは…俺の魔術の物理的な表出だ。俺は裂け目を食い止めようとしている。やればやるほど、氷は強くなる。それでいい。そのはずだ。あなたを守れるなら、俺は氷の塊となったとしても構わない」
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "No. I'm protecting you. The warp-ice... is a physical manifestation of my sorcery. I am trying to hold back the breach. And the more I try, the stronger the ice becomes. That's good. It should. I'll become a block of ice if it lets me keep you safe."

traits.locale_text: {n}ハインリックスは息を殺して笑う。{/n}「違う。俺があなたを守っているんだ。ワープ・アイスは…俺の魔術の物理的な表出だ。俺は裂け目を食い止めようとしている。やればやるほど、氷は強くなる。それでいい。そのはずだ。あなたを守れるなら、俺は氷の塊となったとしても構わない」

languages.text: {n}Heinrix rit dans sa barbe.{/n} « Non, je vous protège. Cette glace... est une manifestation physique de ma sorcellerie. Je tente de retenir la brèche. Plus mes efforts s'intensifient, plus la glace se renforce. C'est une bonne chose. Oui, parce que si ça me permet de vous protéger, alors je me transformerai volontiers en bloc de glace. »
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "No. I'm protecting you. The warp-ice... is a physical manifestation of my sorcery. I am trying to hold back the breach. And the more I try, the stronger the ice becomes. That's good. It should. I'll become a block of ice if it lets me keep you safe."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix rit dans sa barbe.{/n} « Non, je vous protège. Cette glace... est une manifestation physique de ma sorcellerie. Je tente de retenir la brèche. Plus mes efforts s'intensifient, plus la glace se renforce. C'est une bonne chose. Oui, parce que si ça me permet de vous protéger, alors je me transformerai volontiers en bloc de glace. »

languages.text: {n}Heinrix lacht kaum hörbar.{/n} "Nein. Ich beschütze Euch. Das Warp-Eis ... ist eine körperliche Gestalt meiner Magie. Ich kämpfe darum, den Riss zurückzuhalten. Aber je mehr ich kämpfe, desto stärker wird das Eis. Das ist gut. So sollte es sein. Ich werde selbst zu einem Eisblock, wenn ich Euch dadurch beschützen kann."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "No. I'm protecting you. The warp-ice... is a physical manifestation of my sorcery. I am trying to hold back the breach. And the more I try, the stronger the ice becomes. That's good. It should. I'll become a block of ice if it lets me keep you safe."

traits.locale_text: {n}Heinrix lacht kaum hörbar.{/n} "Nein. Ich beschütze Euch. Das Warp-Eis ... ist eine körperliche Gestalt meiner Magie. Ich kämpfe darum, den Riss zurückzuhalten. Aber je mehr ich kämpfe, desto stärker wird das Eis. Das ist gut. So sollte es sein. Ich werde selbst zu einem Eisblock, wenn ich Euch dadurch beschützen kann."

languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "No. I'm protecting you. The warp-ice... is a physical manifestation of my sorcery. I am trying to hold back the breach. And the more I try, the stronger the ice becomes. That's good. It should. I'll become a block of ice if it lets me keep you safe."

languages.text: {n}Heinrix, belli belirsiz kahkaha atıyor.{/n} "Hayır, seni koruyorum. Öteboyut buzu... Sahirliğimin fiziksel bir tezahürü. Kırılmayı dizginlemeye çalışıyorum. Ben denedikçe buz, daha da güçleniyor. Bu iyi bir şey. Böyle olması gerek. Seni güvende tutmamı sağlayacaksa gerekirse buz küpüne dönüşürüm."
languages.original_text: {n}Heinrix laughs under his breath.{/n} "No. I'm protecting you. The warp-ice... is a physical manifestation of my sorcery. I am trying to hold back the breach. And the more I try, the stronger the ice becomes. That's good. It should. I'll become a block of ice if it lets me keep you safe."
